product_name: PocketFuel Whole Food Fuel - Multiple Servings
long_description: PocketFuel Whole Food Fuel Nut Butter is a portable energy source that you can take anywhere. Enjoy PocketFuel when you're running, biking, hiking, surfing, paddling, traveling and relaxing. Made from 100% natural, whole-food ingredients found in nuts, seeds and fruits; each blend is slow burning and easy to digest. Crunchy Banana Blueberry flavor is bursting with blueberries and has a great crunch from the crushed dried bananas; soy-free, dairy-free, gluten-free and vegan. Chia Goji Honey flavor blends roasted almonds with chia seeds, goji berries and pure honey; soy-free, dairy-free and gluten-free. Chocolate Haze flavor combines hazelnuts, almonds and rich chocolate into a silky smooth blend; soy-free, dairy-free, gluten-free and vegan. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: PocketFuel Whole Food Fuel Nut Butter is a portable energy source that you can take anywhere. Enjoy PocketFuel when you're running, biking, hiking, surfing, paddling, traveling and relaxing.
